ALPR-RKNN.Name: License Plate Reader (RKNN)
ALPR-RKNN.Description: Detects and readers single-line and multi-line licence plates. This module only works with Rockchip RK3588/RK3588S NPUs like the Orange Pi 5/5B/5 Plus.

ModuleReleases.ReleaseNotes: Updated to match new installer SDK.

RouteMaps.Name: License Plate Reader RKNN
RouteMaps.Description: Detects the characters in license plates detected within an image

Outputs.Name: success
Outputs.Description: True if successful.

Outputs.Name: message
Outputs.Description: A summary of the inference operation.

Outputs.Name: error
Outputs.Description: (Optional) An description of the error if success was false.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min bounds of the plate, label, the plate chars and confidence.

Outputs.Name: count
Outputs.Description: The number of objects found.

Outputs.Name: command
Outputs.Description: The command that was sent as part of this request. Can be detect, list, status.

Outputs.Name: moduleId
Outputs.Description: The Id of the module that processed this request.

Outputs.Name: executionProvider
Outputs.Description: The name of the device or package handling the inference. eg CPU, GPU, TPU, DirectML.

Outputs.Name: canUseGPU
Outputs.Description: True if this module can use the current GPU if one is present.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).

Outputs.Name: analysisRoundTripMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) for the round trip to the analysis module and back.
